attributes.action: Labour Failed. Dissolve goverment and hold a general election now.
attributes.additional_details: We, the undersigned, urge the Prime Minister to dissolve Parliament and call a general election. Polls show Labour’s support has fallen from its 2024 landslide to the low-20s, sometimes behind Reform UK, with only 13% approving the government’s record. Record small-boat crossings, early prisoner releases, economic concerns, and ministerial resignations have eroded confidence. A fresh mandate is needed under the Dissolution and Calling of Parliament Act 2022.
attributes.background: Dissolve Parliament and call a general election now, allowing voters to choose a government that can address immigration, economic stability, crime, and integrity in public office, restoring trust and delivering on the promises of effective change.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/727309
